enumDescriptions.ConfigureComponents: Can configure components that this service manages.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureSelf: Can change the password for the current user account and log out of their own sessions.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureUsers: Can configure users and their accounts.
enumDescriptions.Login: Can log in to the service and read Resources.

enumLongDescriptions.NoAuth: This value shall be used to indicate an operation does not require authentication.  This privilege shall not be used in Redfish Roles.

title: #Privileges
